name: Cat with the Lamps
description:
Cat with the Lamps:

This cat won't stop turning on lamps!

Controls:

SPACE to progress dialogue.

LEFT CLICK to select lamp.

Credits:

BOBBLE: Art, Programing

ALBY: Sound effects
